# Encoding F*cker

## FR

Nous cherchons un mot de passe qui aurait subit un peu de magie noire.

Retrouvez le !

PS : Format du flag : FLAG{motdepasse}

## EN

We are looking to a password but some black magic was cast on it.
Find it back!

Flag format is FLAG{motdepasse}



Auteur : K_lfa (BZHack / ESDAcademy)

## Solve

Replacing 48 with 0 and 49 with 1 for binary:
```

```
Magic in Cyberchef : Binary + Base32
```
NjYzMjM1NjEzMjY2NjMzNzMyMzYzOTMwNjIzNzM4MzA2MjMyNjEzMTM0NjUzMTM0MzA2NTY2MzY2MTM5NjUzMDBhCg==
```
looks like base64
```
66323561326663373236393062373830623261313465313430656636613965300a
```
probably hex ?
```
f25a2fc72690b780b2a14e140ef6a9e0
```
md5 => crackstation

|Hash|Type|Result|
|---|---|---|
|f25a2fc72690b780b2a14e140ef6a9e0|md5|iloveyou|

=> `FLAG{iloveyou}`
